description: This file defines a custom React hook 'useNotifications' that manages notification data by fetching from an API, polling periodically, and providing functions to mark notifications as read. It is used for real-time notification updates in a React frontend.

methods.name: useNotifications()
methods.description: Custom React hook that fetches notifications, polls for updates every 10 seconds, and provides functions to mark notifications as read and refresh data.

methods.name: fetchAll
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch all notifications and update state accordingly.

methods.name: markRead
methods.description: Asynchronous function to mark a notification as read by its ID.
